item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Oil surges after Biden comments on Israeli retaliation
2. UK gives Chagos islands to Mauritius to secure military base
3. JD Vance ‘crazy’ for refusing to accept 2020 election result, Republican Senate candidate says
4. Top block trader Andrew Liebeskind exits LMR hedge fund after 10 months
5. [Opinion] We need a plan to revive Canary Wharf
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
